docs.title: Welcome
docs.text: Welcome to my personal website! On this site can you find links to some of my projects, documentation, my personal blog where I post random stuff.

docs.title: Transparency
docs.text: The contents of my website (Everything found under the main devsanghani.me domain) are open source and can be found on Github
